snippet: More than five years after a doctor blew up his East Side town house, the valuable and empty parcel shows no sign of new life.
abstract: More than five years after a doctor blew up his East Side town house, the valuable and empty parcel shows no sign of new life.
lead_paragraph: It seems that Dr. Nicholas Bartha got what he apparently wanted: If he could not live in the town house on East 62nd Street, no one could.

headline.main: Land Leveled in Divorce Awaits Economy's Return
